医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
工作压力会增加不利心血管健康措施的风险在美国大量没有心血管疾病的多种族成年人群体中，那些承受工作压力的人更有可能出现心血管健康状况不佳的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Work-stress-increases-risk-of-unfavorable-cardioangio-health-measures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Work-stress-increases-risk-of-unfavorable-cardioangio-health-measures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75b409da-59b3-42bd-98eb-7deca907be2c Wed, 06 Nov 2024 08:08:52 -0500 Work stress increases risk of unfavorable cardiovascular health measures
研究人员获得 4500 万加元用于研究新的精神病治疗方法百分之一的人在一生中会经历精神病发作，这些通常出现在青春期末或成年早期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-receive-CADc2a045c2a0million-to-study-new-psychosis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-receive-CADc2a045c2a0million-to-study-new-psychosis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fd1f952-60c9-4fab-9055-9ca60bc68f2d Wed, 06 Nov 2024 08:01:43 -0500 Researchers receive CAD 45 million to study new psychosis treatments
特朗普重返白宫准备搅乱医疗保健安全网前总统唐纳德·特朗普的选举胜利和即将重返白宫可能会带来缩减国家公共健康保险计划的变化——增加未参保率，同时对堕胎和其他生殖保健设置新的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Trumpe28099s-White-House-return-poished-to-tangle-health-care-safety-net.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Trumpe28099s-White-House-return-poished-to-tangle-health-care-safety-net.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1509d992-f3dc-412e-a446-c503e48d5e0a Wed, 06 Nov 2024 07:38:24 -0500 Trump’s White House return poised to tangle health care safety net
Solascure 与美国陆军外科研究所合作进行战伤护理SOLASCURE Ltd（“SolasCure”）是一家开发新型治疗方法以改变慢性伤口护理的生物技术公司，与美国陆军外科研究所（“USAISR”）今天宣布开展一项研究合作，以评估 SolasCure 的研究产品 Aurase Wound Gel，作为处理战伤的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Solascure-and-US-Army-Institute-of-Surgical-Research-collaborate-for-combat-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Solascure-and-US-Army-Institute-of-Surgical-Research-collaborate-for-combat-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ef2deaa-d83b-4984-8bdb-3c649976387c Wed, 06 Nov 2024 06:41:00 -0500 Solascure and U.S. Army Institute of Surgical Research collaborate for combat wound care
新研究探讨了 omega-3 和 omega-6 脂肪酸如何影响癌症发病率这项研究强调了多不饱和脂肪酸与癌症风险之间的关系，表明血液生物标志物可能是准确评估的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-research-explores-how-omega-3-and-omega-6-fatty-acids-may-impact-cancer-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-research-explores-how-omega-3-and-omega-6-fatty-acids-may-impact-cancer-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43e165cf-085e-41af-b7f3-77dbe576ee3f Wed, 06 Nov 2024 06:41:00 -0500 New research explores how omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids may impact cancer rates
老鼠尾巴在防止跌倒和提高平衡方面发挥着关键作用老鼠为什么有尾巴？这个问题的答案并不像您想象的那么简单。冲绳科学技术研究所 (OIST) 的新研究表明，不起眼的老鼠尾巴的作用比之前想象的要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Mice-tails-play-a-key-role-in-preventing-falls-and-improving-balance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Mice-tails-play-a-key-role-in-preventing-falls-and-improving-balance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=999c42b8-fdba-42c4-8688-da98a5619299 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 06:31:26 -0500 Mice tails play a key role in preventing falls and improving balance
富含多酚的地中海饮食有助于保持大脑年轻一项研究表明，富含多酚的地中海和绿色 MED 饮食可以通过改善血糖控制来减缓大脑衰老并减少神经退行性变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Polyphen-rich-Mediterranean-diets-could-help-keep-the-brain-younger.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Polyphen-rich-Mediterranean-diets-could-help-keep-the-brain-younger.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b27173aa-08b7-4f6b-b4fe-123f6b5d15de Wed, 06 Nov 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Polyphenol-rich Mediterranean diets could help keep the brain younger
CRISPR 基因编辑可能会带来新的缺陷CRISPR工具能够修复导致免疫性疾病慢性肉芽肿病的遗传缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Gene-editing-with-CRISPR-may-introduce-new-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Gene-editing-with-CRISPR-may-introduce-new-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0609656-1f81-4b55-8c28-16c6f9c0a6f8 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 05:59:00 -0500 Gene editing with CRISPR may introduce new defects
社区卫生工作者遍布美国各地，甚至在农村地区凯利·恩格布雷森（Kelly Engebretson）在腿部截肢后能够安装假肢，他感到很兴奋。但他不确定如何去赴约。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Community-health-workers-spread-across-the-US-even-in-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Community-health-workers-spread-across-the-US-even-in-rural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37f982cc-c54e-43de-b7d4-073ec7d6f811 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 05:52:39 -0500 Community health workers spread across the US, even in rural areas
怀孕期间补充维生素 D 可增强儿童骨骼南安普顿大学和南安普顿大学医院 (UHS) 领导的最新研究表明，母亲在怀孕期间补充维生素 D 的孩子在七岁时仍然拥有更强健的骨骼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Vitamin-D-supplements-during-pregnancy-strengthen-childrens-bones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Vitamin-D-supplements-during-pregnancy-strengthen-childrens-bones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c11fc0-8b5f-4bf2-9961-c738df1307a5 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 05:50:55 -0500 Vitamin D supplements during pregnancy strengthen children's bones
